label: 諸鬘
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [Also 諸葛] Morokazura can mean either aoi or a Kamo Festival decoration made of katsura and aoi leaves, which was attached to blinds, worn on the head, etc. (p. 306n). [葵、賀茂祭、桂]
